title: Big New Halo Mode and Monster Hunter Clone From Xbox?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.28.22
description:
Blessing and Tamoor talk about a rumored new Halo Infinite mode and Monster Hunter clone from Xbox, From Software speaking on Elden Ring's difficulty, and Tam gives a rant about NFTs!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:00 - Housekeeping

Xcast is recording live later today on Patreon and goes up for everyone tomorrow on Youtube and podcast services around the globe.

Right after this show, Greg’s doing a Kinda Funny community podcast-a-thon! He’s doing five different KFBF podcasts right after KFGD live on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. Come watch them all!

The Roper Report -
00:09:00 - Certain Affinity may be working on a new Halo Infinite mode as well as an Xbox ‘Monster Hunter clone’
00:23:49 - FromSoftware speaks on Elden Ring’s difficulty
00:36:24 - Ads
00:38:30 - Yacht Club is about to make a mega announcement!
00:50:11 - Ubisoft's NFT bosses say players just "don't get it"
01:03:06 - Epic Games Store gave away 765m free games last year, helping it reach 194m users
01:04:26 - Netflix signs partnership to add more games
01:05:34 - Sega quits Japanese arcade business after 50 years
01:07:45 - Out today
01:08:48 - NVIDIA GeForce Update
01:09:30 - Squad Up: Rhys - PlayStation - redhawker23
01:10:05 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Mon: Blessing and Cam Hawkins
Tues: Greg and Whitta
Wed: Blessing and Andy
Thurs: Greg and Tim
Fri: Greg and Bless
